Detailed Description

A polygon shape.

A polygon shape is defined using 

:start shape:
    library = egs_polygon_shape
    points = list of at least 3 2D points (i.e. at least 6 floating numbers)
:stop shape:

and delivers points uniformely distributed within a polygon in the xy-plane at z=0. When 3 2D points are given, the actual shape being constructed will be EGS_TriangleShape. For polygons in other planes, attach an affine transformation to the shape.
